website_summaries.verdict: Perfect bed for staying warm in drafty homes, basements, garages, or barns.
pros: Insulated layers use your cat's own body heat to warm the bed
Spacious bed has room for 2 average-sized cats
Bed can be used in a barn or outdoors to help keep feral cats warm
cons: Hood only covers half of the bed

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad that I bought her this bed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a self warming bed for my kitty. The beds that I bought her before weren't warm enough - she was hanging out on my fleece slippers. Initially I was trying to look for something without leopard print and that was a bit hard to find but thank goodness I found this one! The hood has paw imprints (cute) and that's about it. Kitty took this bed immediately. She loves it so much that I bought her one for the other room so she can pick and choose where she wants to sleep. I am so glad that I bought her this bed! Please don't stop making the small size and plain colors!
customer_reviews.author: Non sun worshipper

customer_reviews.title: Fits two cats
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies love this bed. My studio apartment get pretty cold at night and early mornings and I would find myself grabbing them and snuggling with them under my blanket to warm up their frozen ears and paws. The larger cat in the photo he does not like the hood so I removed it. Now I've noticed when he climbs out in the morning his ears and paws are nice and warm. I would buy a second one but him and my new kitty enjoy cuddling as you can see (: he is a large cat weighing at 14lbs and the little one she is all fluff they fit pretty snugg. May have to invest in a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a stray cat outside who desperately needed a warm bed. It is so nice and soft, the header keeps the wind away. I tucked the bed into a shelter above the ground and this cat used it the very first night. I feel so great knowing this scared little cat is warm and protected at night now in this cute little bed.
customer_reviews.author: lifelongstudent

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for our cat with anxiety!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats, one of them has anxiety and chews her fur. I got her this bed a few weeks ago and showed it to her once and she knew immediately it was hers. She’s ALWAYS in it and her missing fur is starting to grow back in!!
customer_reviews.author: RLC708

customer_reviews.title: When it came, my cat went in it before ...
customer_reviews.text: When it came, my cat went in it before I could put the hood on, and he stayed right there. Then I moved it to another room, and he's there now. He's 14 lbs, and the 20-inch has quite a bit of unused space when he lays down.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great product but my cat won't use it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this bed for my outdoor cat. He has an insulated, heated shed to stay in. I thought this self-warming bed would add to his comfort. We put a camera inside the shed. He lays everywhere except this bed! I unzipped the top for a few days to see if that made a difference - it did not. The nylon bottom does make a crinkly noise when I put pressure on the bed. This could be the issue. I hope that he warms up to it as the winter goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Mattoon

customer_reviews.title: Impossible for your cats not to love it
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this several years ago and after years of washing and use, there was a hooded zipper malfunction. It is now in another room and gets frequent use, even without the hood. My cats loved the hooded bed so much, I bought a replacement. My 2 large female curl up in it together daily.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The cat loved it... until it broke
customer_reviews.text: I'd love to give this bed a better review because my cat truly loved it, she would stay so warm inside and would hardly leave. That was until about a month in I picked it up to move it and a ton of small plastic beads fell out. Apparently she managed to tear a hole in the interior, despite having trimmed claws. Hopefully she didn't ingest any of those beads, but I threw the whole thing away.
customer_reviews.author: Kuby

customer_reviews.title: Return process is awful
customer_reviews.text: The bed is of good quality but definitely not worth the price. My cats are both under 2 years old and the hood never seems to be up. I am not sure if that is by design or caused by my cats wrestling. I attempted to go through the return process but it would cost me just over $15 with shipping and restocking fee. They also advised that if the item wasn't to there standards that a refund would not be issued.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says reflects body heat back up to cat.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality worth the price.Just the right size. my petite girl cat who's always cold loves it.Would not use it until I put one of her old blankets in it.Also had to remove hood which she did not care for.Thank goodness it was removable with a zipper.When I slipped my hand under her to see it was very warm and she was warm.Love it.Would recommend it for cold kitties.
customer_reviews.author: chistina

customer_reviews.title: A great bed for a feral cat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for a feral cat who sleeps in my unheated garage. She is still very timid about new things, but took to this bed right away. I didn't want something to plug in for heat because I'm concerned about fire hazards, but this bed reflects body heat and provides some protection from drafts, while allowing her to still have visibility for potential threats (real or imagined - she is very timid).
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer88

customer_reviews.title: Our cat seems to like the bed
customer_reviews.text: Our cat seems to like the bed, but I have 2 reservations from the human side. I don't think the cushion is supportive enough. Secondly, the top has a crease in it from shipping and it does not stay up. I think the top part should be higher to give the cat a little more room. She weights 5 lb and a few ounces and it is hard for her to change her position.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Heller

customer_reviews.title: The cats love 'em
customer_reviews.text: They were a bit hesitant at first, of course, that may have been the fact that we pretty much shoved them in there saying "look, see how comfy" Their disdain was obvious :) But now they're constantly cuddled up in one or the other. the only problem, three cats, two kitty beds. :) But yeah, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Scott

customer_reviews.title: MY BEST PURCHASE OF THE YEAR!
customer_reviews.text: I have a formerly feral cat, who will come inside for portions of a cold night, but still likes being outside the majority of the time. I keep this bed on my back porch & she literally lives in it, since it got cold. I'm considering buying another to put away for when this wears out.
customer_reviews.author: P. Stancil

customer_reviews.title: My cat is ridiculously picky and has a habit of ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat is ridiculously picky and has a habit of stealing beds from the (much) larger dogs. Now when the dogs go to bed, she comes right behind them and curls up in hers. Win.
customer_reviews.author: Earthwanderer

customer_reviews.title: It's not self-warming if you cat hates it :(
customer_reviews.text: My cat is not at all into this pet bed and the half-cover is useless (it arrived a little and won't hold any sort of shape). Unfortunately, he doesn't even like it without the half-cover. K&H products are usually a hit with him, but this one was a dud. Great product in theory, lacking in execution.
customer_reviews.author: ACTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful bed. Well constructed, soft and warm. My cat, being a typical cat used it once and decided he would rather sleep on the floor. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bed for the price, or what I think is competitive with my budget! Keeps my little buddy nice and warm when I have the fan on really high at night while I sleep. He loves his bed and leaves his favorite toys stuffed inside the edges of the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Millertime

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: The cat loves it. Was a little hesitant at first, but a couple of days later he went in and basically lives in there now.
customer_reviews.author: Jun Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive kitty hideaway
customer_reviews.text: We got the tan/brown; the paw print detail on the lining and pillow is a nice, subtle touch. The wire securing the hood in its open position is substantial, not floppy at all, just as pictured. We got the cave effect we wanted, but if your kitty is a burrower, this is not the bed for you. Note: the hood zips off, which is helpful because our kitty is deeply suspicious of new things! Once she's claimed her territory, we'll try the hood again. Overall, a well-made item.
customer_reviews.author: ElfN

customer_reviews.title: Not My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of dog/cat beds, soft blankets and furniture. The fabric did not feel soft and warm. I prefer to buy ones with Sherpa, fleece, soft, and cozy fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: ARDTTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: SELF WARMING so it's safe & kitties stay warm in a chilly room.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was self-warming since I always consider safety a major issue. I really liked the zip-on semi-hood that helps block the cold. It's been a huge hit with my kitties as soon as I got it put down, they got in and it stays in constant use! On my list to get another one!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My finicky Main Coone loves her bed! So much that I have to get her out of it so she can explore, play etc. Cozy, and washes incredibly well. Wash it weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Soy la Reina

customer_reviews.title: Cozy!
customer_reviews.text: Well made cat bed, Herman loves it, but not the hood. I removed the wire from hood so the fabric can still be used for extra padding.
customer_reviews.author: Nature Lover

customer_reviews.title: Buddy approved “two paws up”
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this. I’m glad the top can be detached, he likes it better without it. It’s very soft.
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: I had to remove the hood for a couple of days to get my cat to lay inside. Now that he uses it with the hood he stays warm & blocks the wind. I use it on a covered patio so not exposed to rain. Only complaint I have is the inside cushion is not removable so it can’t be washed.
customer_reviews.author: TJNick

customer_reviews.title: Great for sphynx!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our sphynx kitten, and out of all of his beds (4) he chooses this one. We keep our room cold at night, and this bed keeps him toasty.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a recent cat we adopted from the ASPCA. She loves it and sleeps in it nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Pete H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: My cats and dog love these beds. I have two of these beds.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this bed.
customer_reviews.text: Both my maine coons love this bed. One of them has arthritis and the bed seems to keep her warm and comfortable. They both love the little partial hood.
customer_reviews.author: bison7

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Cat
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loves this bed. You can wash the cover, but I would not recommend washing the hood. There is a piece of metal in the hood that helps it keep its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Saras

customer_reviews.title: Seemed ok
customer_reviews.text: Hard to say my cat hated it and just peed in it over and over that I had to just throw it away..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My cats needed a new bed and one of them likes to sleep on top of their house, this is very much to his liking!
customer_reviews.author: patricia principate

customer_reviews.title: Great for Chihuahuas
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these for my Chihuahuas, they love them
customer_reviews.author: MiasMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it and the half cover is nice for him to block the light when it’s on.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: My little dogs loves this bed. It keeps the light out of their eyes. Easy to wash. The hood comes off completely. Both my dogs weigh 12-13 lbs. They both fit but slightly snug.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it, It took a few days but now they use it all the time ! Gret product.
customer_reviews.author: Brad W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product my cats love the beds
customer_reviews.text: Great product my cats love the beds. And they look like they're going to be very easy to wash and take care of.
customer_reviews.author: betty j bills

customer_reviews.title: Our 4 Cats Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Another very well made product by K&H. My cats just love this bed. As soon as I unpacked it and zipped the semi top on, they were in it. We own several (8 other pet beds from K&H - placed in different areas of our home) but this is the first of this design. I opted for this one because we have a 17 year old kitty and thought it would keep him out of any drafts.
customer_reviews.author: Upstate gardener

product_meta.title: K&H PET PRODUCTS Self-Warming Kitty Bed Hooded Pet Bed for Cats or Dogs Blue/Gray Large 20 Inches
product_meta.description: This removable hooded bed offers pets privacy and a secure place to cuddle up. The soft polyfil cushion has a layer of metalized insulation that radiates warmth generated from the pets own body heat. The zipper around the bottom of the bed makes the cover removable and machine washable. High sidewalls make your pet feel secure and safe. Available in two sizes and two colors, perfect for keeping any cat or small dog warm on those chilly nights; no electricity required. One year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Plush self-warming pet bed for dogs and cats returns body heat to your pet to keep them warm
Effectively captures and reflects your pets’s body heat
Plush cushion for ultimate sleeping comfort with high sidewalls and removable hood for privacy and security
Helps pets stay warm; no electricity required
Removable cover is machine washable for easy care
One year limited warranty; if you have questions, please contact us at 1-877-738-5188
Large size measures 20 inches in diameter, perfect for cats and small dogs
Age range description: All Life Stages

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
